data.eml:eml: Designation of a neotype for Clorindaia hecaloides Linnavuori (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Faltalini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paradell, S., Zahniser, J. N. (2018): Designation of a neotype for Clorindaia hecaloides Linnavuori (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Faltalini). Zootaxa 4532 (2): 293-295, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.2.9
